metadata.description: Spells that control, direct, and manipulate fire, heat, and flame-based phenomena

spells.name: Control the Dancing Flame
spells.description: This spell allows the caster to control the movement and shape of existing flames. Fire can be made to dance, form shapes, move along surfaces, or burn in specific patterns. The flames remain the same intensity but obey the caster's will.

spells.name: Shield of the Loyal Flames
spells.description: This spell creates a protective barrier of controlled fire around the target. The flames provide warmth and light while protecting against cold attacks and deterring enemies. The fire burns without consuming oxygen or harming the protected person.

spells.name: Bind the Raging Inferno
spells.description: This spell controls large fires, such as building fires or forest blazes, directing their spread and intensity. The fire can be contained, redirected away from valuable areas, or concentrated to burn more fiercely in specific locations.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (control major fire), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration, +3 Structure

spells.name: Lancet of Directed Flame
spells.description: This spell shapes fire into a precise, controlled beam that can cut through materials like a torch. The flame lancet can slice wood, melt metal, or burn through rope with surgical precision while leaving surrounding areas untouched.

spells.name: Prison of Encircling Flames
spells.description: This spell creates a ring of fire that surrounds and traps a target. The flames rise high enough to prevent escape and burn hot enough to deter approach. The fire moves to follow the target if they try to flee.

spells.name: Heat of the Forge's Heart
spells.description: This spell controls and concentrates heat within an object, making it burn at specific temperatures. Metal can be heated for forging, objects can be warmed for comfort, or precise temperatures can be maintained for alchemical work.

spells.name: Cloak of the Fire's Friend
spells.description: This spell grants the target immunity to fire and heat damage by controlling how flames and heat interact with their body. They can walk through fires unharmed, handle red-hot metal, and resist all forms of heat-based attacks.

spells.name: Serpent of the Flowing Flame
spells.description: This spell shapes fire into the form of a serpent that can move independently and attack enemies. The fire serpent can slither across surfaces, coil around victims, and bite with burning fangs that deal +15 damage.

spells.name: Forge of the Tireless Smith
spells.description: This spell creates and maintains a forge fire that burns at precisely the right temperature for metalworking. The fire requires no fuel, maintains consistent heat, and can be adjusted for different types of work throughout the month.

spells.name: Command the Phoenix's Flight
spells.description: This mighty spell allows the caster to control fire across a vast area, directing forest fires, volcanic eruptions, or other massive flame phenomena. The power to command such forces requires tremendous skill and concentration.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (control massive fire), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration, +4 Boundary

spells.name: Loyal Flame of the Eternal Vigil
spells.description: This spell creates a flame that burns continuously for an entire year without fuel. The fire provides steady light and warmth, can be dimmed or brightened at will, and serves as an eternal vigil light or beacon.

spells.name: Chariot of Blazing Glory
spells.description: This spell creates a vehicle made of controlled flames that can carry the caster and passengers through the air. The fire chariot provides flight while protecting its occupants from the heat, appearing as a magnificent display of magical power.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create major fire construct), +1 Touch, +2 Sun
